page.title: Home

hero.headline: Trim Tile and Stone
hero.textline: Specializing in bathroom, kitchen, and basement renovations in Burlington and surrounding areas.

blocks.content:
## Burlington Home Renovations ðŸ”¨

We provide quality home renovation services for bathroom, kitchen, and basement renovations, as well as outdoor decks.All of our services come with a guarantee of **quality**, **dedication**, and **durability**.

We are fully insured and offer warranties on our work. You know where to find us when you want a follow up!

All estimates are **free** and **flexible** according to materials and scheduling.
